caption:
This photo captures a somewhat dimly lit scene, likely in an urban setting, featuring a man in the foreground who is exiting a vehicle or structure. The man is dressed in a black shirt and trousers, wearing a cap, and is looking slightly off-camera with a neutral expression. He is carrying a bicycle next to him, which adds to the urban, commuter vibe of the image.

Behind him, there is a hint of background activity with other people who appear to be seated and standing. The environment includes a steel structure, possibly part of a ferry or a public transport vessel, which suggests a transit hub or terminal. The sky is visible in the background, showing patches of blue and clouds, indicating it might be a partly cloudy day.

The overall composition has a candid, documentary feel, catching a moment of everyday movement and travel, emphasizing urban life and public transportation.
title: "Sea Transit" ferry has been operating for one year between downtown Honolulu and Pearl Harbor - an alternative to freeway congestion. It also carries military-related employees across Pearl Harbor to the parking lot - saving them a 45-minute drive. Some passengers complete their trip on bicycles.
